abstract: Dark cloud of smoke from extensive Canadian wildfires lifts from Denver area, but climate scientists warn that ongoing Western drought is likely to bring more fires and accompanying air pollution.
lead_paragraph: The pollution-laden haze, which degraded air quality across the region, was pushed down from extensive wildfires that have spread across Western Canada.

headline.main: Dark Cloud Lifts Over Denver, but Experts Warn of More to Come
headline.print_headline: Dark Cloud Lifts Over Denver, but Experts Warn of More to Come

snippet: The pollution-laden haze, which degraded air quality across the region, was pushed down from extensive wildfires that have spread across Western Canada.
